jphase.distributions

Class EDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • jphase.distributions.EDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDistribution

    public abstract class EDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDistribution
    This is an abstract class that implements some of the methods that define a distribution
    Author:
    Andrés Sarmiento. Universidad de los Andes. (C) 2013
